Articles.Content: i wonder does there any add-on with two site capsule that i can use with stock parts, i now play stock only KSP without add-ones but i want something like Gemini and not want use Lander-can.

Home Grown Rockets has a nice Gemini-like two-seater called the "Radish". (Its 1.875m parts are also great for interplanetary probes -- they fit very nicely for missions too big for the 1.25 meter parts, but where 2.5m parts are overkill.)

The K2 Command Pod should be exactly what you're looking for. It has the same attachment nodes as the Mk1 pod, 1.25m on the bottom and 0.625m on top. It doesn't have an IVA unfortunately, but otherwise is a very good capsule.
Corvus is also a very well made one that's just the pod and some other miscellany accessories to go with it.

There is a stand alone capsule if you don't want a lot of parts. Is the Corvus which was made by the same person that create HGR but is 1.25. I love this pod and is eary on career so i love it.

EDIT: just saw the prev reply:D

Edited June 7, 2015 by CosmoBro

I second Corvus. I've also used FASA's.

I'm going to have to try the others.
